refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Common user interface functions. This header includes all other GIMP User Interface Library headers.

refsect2.title: gimp_ui_init ()
refsect2.para: This function initializes GTK+ with gtk_init() and initializes GDK's image rendering subsystem (GdkRGB) to follow the GIMP main program's colormap allocation/installation policy.

It also sets up various other things so that the plug-in user looks and behaves like the GIMP core. This includes selecting the GTK+ theme and setting up the help system as chosen in the GIMP preferences. Any plug-in that provides a user interface should call this function.

listitem.simpara: The name of the plug-in which will be passed as argv[0] to gtk_init(). It's a convention to use the name of the executable and _not_ the PDB procedure name.
This parameter is unused and exists for historical reasons only.

refsect2.title: gimp_ui_get_display_window ()
refsect2.para: Returns the GdkWindow of a display window. The purpose is to allow to make plug-in dialogs transient to the image display as explained with gdk_window_set_transient_for().
You shouldn't have to call this function directly. Use gimp_window_set_transient_for_display() instead.

listitem.simpara: A reference to a GdkWindow or NULL. You should unref the window using g_object_unref() as soon as you don't need it any longer.

refsect2.title: gimp_ui_get_progress_window ()
refsect2.para: Returns the GdkWindow of the window this plug-in's progress bar is shown in. Use it to make plug-in dialogs transient to this window as explained with gdk_window_set_transient_for().
You shouldn't have to call this function directly. Use gimp_window_set_transient() instead.

listitem.simpara: A reference to a GdkWindow or NULL. You should unref the window using g_object_unref() as soon as you don't need it any longer.

refsect2.title: gimp_window_set_transient ()
refsect2.para: Indicates to the window manager that window is a transient dialog associated with the GIMP window that the plug-in has been started from. See also gimp_window_set_transient_for_display().

listitem.simpara: the GtkWindow that should become transient

refsect2.title: gimp_window_set_transient_for_display ()
refsect2.para: Indicates to the window manager that window is a transient dialog associated with the GIMP image window that is identified by it's display ID. See gdk_window_set_transient_for() for more information.
Most of the time you will want to use the convenience function gimp_window_set_transient().

listitem.simpara: the GtkWindow that should become transient
display ID of the image window that should become the parent
